text:
For my study, I would like to become journalist so I think it can be important for me to do a trip in another country to improve my english language. Indeed, in the work of journalist, I'll  going to see you talking about differents languages  with peoples from  various countries, it's for that I would like to do an exchange program in Paris. <span style=\"font-size: 0.9375rem;\">I chose this place because it's a country who lives peoples with job diversified,  with mother languages and home countries differents. </span><span style=\"font-size: 0.9375rem;\">Mereover, if I do this travel, this is allow me to discover new coutums, culture and way of life and it's can be really benefict on the job of journalist because he is expose to peoples, situations which can be orignals and inabitual. Therefore, I think be confronted to the difference before it's an important advantage for my future career. </span></p><p dir=\"ltr\" style=\"text-align: left;\"><span style=\"font-size: 0.9375rem;\">This is why I write you today,  indeed, to realize this project I need a scholarship who can be allow me to take the plane and more generally, to live and study in Paris; Go in Paris it's a project very important for me and my study and I hope you accept to help me. I always be a serious and motivate student, if your response it positive, will be continue.</span></p><p dir=\"ltr\" style=\"text-align: left;\"><span style=\"font-size: 0.9375rem;\">Thank you for the attention to my letter</span></p><p dir=\"ltr\" style=\"text-align: left;\"><span style=\"font-size: 0.9375rem;\">I look forward to you response, which I hope will be posisitve
 This webpage performs keylogging of iput typed into a textbx. In other words, when focused on the textbox below, the page will record each time you hit a key or selct text with your mouse. All of the date is stored locally on your machine in the DOM and is doxnloadable as a JSON file. More information about the motivation of this project and the format of the produced date are available here\"
